title: Vaccination Simulation Training Using 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and proficiency in injection equipment usage
context.additional_context: Hybrid education model combining smartphone-based 3D simulations with offline practical training

learning_goals: Learners can perform injection techniques with 80% accuracy according to standard vaccination procedures in a 3D virtual environment
Learners can select vaccination strategies appropriate for diverse patient scenarios (age, physique, allergic reactions, etc.)
Learners can analyze performance reports generated after simulations to conduct self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
